summary.span: 命名空間提供進階的 GDI+ 影像處理功能。

span.span: The namespace provides advanced GDI+ imaging functionality.

summary.span: 基本圖形功能是由 命名空間所提供。

span.span: Basic graphics functionality is provided by the namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會提供方法來記錄並儲存中繼檔。The class provides methods for recording and saving metafiles. 類別可讓使用者以擴充 GDI + 支援任何影像格式。The class enables users to extend GDI+ to support any image format. 類別會提供方法來儲存和擷取映像檔中的中繼資料。The class provides methods for storing and retrieving metadata in image files. > [!CAUTION] > 類別內命名空間不支援使用 Windows 或 ASP.NET 服務中。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows or ASP.NET service. 嘗試使用這些類別時，這些應用程式類型的其中一個內可能會產生無法預期的問題，例如會受到影響服務的效能和執行階段例外狀況。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions.
